src:
Fazliddin G‘oibnazarov yetti oylik tanaffusdan so‘ng ringga qaytmoqda

07 Nov 2019, 22:49

O‘zbekistonlik bokschi Fazliddin G‘oibnazarov 16-dekabr kuni Qozog‘istonning Olmaota shahrida o‘tkaziladigan boks kechasida jang o‘tkazadi, deya xabar qilmoqda Olamsport.


Foto: Olamsport”

G‘oibnazarovning murabbiyi Abror Tursunpo‘latovning ma’lum qilishicha, Fazliddinda AQSh vizasi bilan bog‘liq muammolar bor. Shu sabab bokschining promouteri hisoblangan Top Rank unga Qozog‘istonda jang tashkil qilib bergan.
“Viza bilan bog‘liq muammo sabab G‘oibnazarovning AQShga yo‘l olishi biroz qiyin kechikmoqda. Bu vaziyatda Top Rank Fazliddin uchun Olmaotadagi boks oqshomidan jang tashkil etib bermoqda. Top Rank va MTK Global kompaniyalari o‘rtasida hamkorlik yo‘lga qo‘yilgan. Tez orada Fazlidinning raqibi e’lon qilinadi. Hozirda bu borada muzokara davom etyapti”, — deydi Tursunpo‘latov.
Eslatib o‘tamiz, Fazliddin G‘oibnazarov so‘nggi jangini shu yilning may oyida AQShning Arizona shtati, Tuson shahrida amerikalik Maykl Foksga qarshi o‘tkazib, imkoniyatni boy berib qo‘ygandi (92:96, 92:96, 93:95).

Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!
text:
Fazliddin Goibnazarov returns to the ring after a seven-month break

07 Nov 2019, 22:49

Uzbek boxer Fazliddin Goibnazarov will fight at the boxing night in Almaty, Kazakhstan, on December 16, Olamsport reports.


Photo: Olamsport ”

Goibnazarov's trainer Abror Tursunpulatov says Fazliddin has problems with the US visa. That is why Top Rank, a boxer's promoter, has fought him in Kazakhstan.
“Goibnazarov's travel to the US is a bit difficult due to visa issues. In this case, Top Rank is fighting for Fazliddin from a boxing evening in Almaty. Partnership between Top Rank and MTK Global. Fazlidin's opponent will soon be announced. Negotiations are currently underway, ”said Tursunpulatov.
Recall that Fazliddin Gaibnazarov lost his last fight in May this year in Tucson, Arizona, USA against Michael Fox (92:96, 92:96, 93:95) .

For more on football and sports news, subscribe to @ river_sport!
